import React, { useState,useRef } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardImg, CardText, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, Button, Image, CardHeader, Popover, PopoverHeader, PopoverBody, Carousel, CarouselItem, CarouselControl, CarouselIndicators, CarouselCaption } from 'reactstrap'; import "./ItemDetailComponent.css"; import img from "../img/img"; import imgItem from "/home/quocthang123/Desktop/Leonardo/leonardo-app/src/components/img/img" export default function ItemDetailComponent(){ const listItemDetails = { bag: [ { imgDisplay: imgItem[0], imgContinue: imgItem[1], name: "Túi Messenger Ipad Camo", price: "460.000₫", typeColor:[] }, { imgDisplay: imgItem[2], imgContinue: imgItem[3], name: "Túi Mini Camo", price: "290.000₫", typeColor:[] } , { imgDisplay: imgItem[4], imgContinue: imgItem[5], name: "Túi Đeo Chéo Zumba Camo", price: "250.000₫", typeColor:[] } , { imgDisplay: imgItem[6], imgContinue: imgItem[7], name: "Túi Grand Camo", price: "360.000₫", typeColor:[] } , { imgDisplay: imgItem[8], imgContinue: imgItem[9], name: "Túi Crossbody Camo", price: "395.000₫", typeColor:[] } , { imgDisplay: imgItem[10], imgContinue: imgItem[11], name: "Balo quai chéo Zumba", price: "380.000₫", typeColor:[] } , { imgDisplay: imgItem[12], imgContinue: imgItem[13], name: "Túi Hộp Oxford", price: "320.000₫", typeColor:[{ color:"gray", imgColor:imgItem[12] }, { color:"black", imgColor:imgItem[14] }] } , { imgDisplay: imgItem[15], imgContinue: imgItem[16], name: "Túi Đeo Chéo Lớn Zumba", price: "340.000₫", typeColor:[] } ] } const [activeGrid, setGird] = useState("3"); const [searchBar, setSearchBar] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setSearchBar(!searchBar); const [activeItemSeen, setActiveItem] = useState(0); const [animateCarousel, setAnimateCarousel] = useState(false); const next = () => { if (animateCarousel) return; const nextIndex = activeItemSeen === listItemDetails.bag.length - 1 ? 0 : activeItemSeen + 1; setActiveItem(nextIndex); } const previous = () => { if (animateCarousel) return; const nextIndex = activeItemSeen === 0 ? listItemDetails.bag.length - 1 : activeItemSeen - 1; setActiveItem(nextIndex); } const goToIndex = (newIndex) => { if (animateCarousel) return; setActiveItem(newIndex); } const slides = listItemDetails.bag.map((item) => { return ( setAnimateCarousel(true)} onExited={() => setAnimateCarousel(false)} > { listItemDetails.bag.map((itemDeital) => { return( {item.name} {item.price} ) }) } ); }); return(
